title: Exam 4
content:
« Previous | Next »
Session Overview For this exam, you will need to know restriction enzymes and how they are used. You will also need to know the steps for constructing a DNA library, and cloning a gene of interest. In addition, you will need to know the steps for amplification of a sequence of DNA. Lastly, you will need to know how to analyze a plasmid using gel electrophoresis.
